import React from 'react' import './course-editor.css' import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { combineReducers, createStore } from 'redux' import { Provider } from 'react-redux' import ModuleList from './module-list' import moduleReducer from '../../reducers/module-reducer' import LessonTabs from './lesson-tabs' import lessonReducer from '../../reducers/lesson-reducer' import TopicPills from './topic-pills' import topicReducer from '../../reducers/topic-reducer' const reducer = combineReducers({ moduleReducer: moduleReducer, lessonReducer: lessonReducer, topicReducer: topicReducer, }) const store = createStore(reducer) const CourseEditor = ({ history }) => { const {courseId, moduleId} = useParams(); return (
history.goBack()} >
